title: user authentication flows
description: Test the user authentication endpoints including login, registration, password recovery, and profile management to ensure secure and successful user authentication flows.

title: appointment scheduling system
description: Verify the appointment scheduling API endpoints for internal staff agenda, public booking links, time blocking, and queue management to ensure correct booking and scheduling functionality.

title: financial management endpoints
description: Test the financial management APIs for sales recording, cash flow tracking, commission calculations, and Stripe subscription payment integration to ensure accurate financial operations.

title: dashboard and reports data
description: Validate the executive dashboard and reports endpoints to ensure KPIs, revenue, ticket size, and occupancy rates are correctly calculated and displayed.

title: theme management endpoints
description: Test the API endpoints responsible for applying and switching customizable visual themes between barber and beauty styles, including automatic and manual switching.

title: mobile responsive ui endpoints
description: Verify the endpoints related to UI responsiveness and PWA support to ensure the application performs well on mobile devices and supports offline usage.

title: security and data isolation
description: Test the security features including row-level security and route protection APIs to ensure multi-tenant data isolation and secure administrative access.

title: queue management system
description: Validate the digital queue system endpoints for managing walk-in clients, real-time updates, and status tracking to ensure efficient client flow management.

title: onboarding wizard endpoints
description: Test the onboarding wizard APIs to ensure smooth new business setup, including team and service configuration creation.

title: external integrations stability
description: Verify the stability and data integrity of integrations with external APIs such as Stripe, Supabase, and AI services.
